title: Remove Caffeine attribution line from home page footer

requirements.text: Remove the "Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai" attribution line (including the caffeine.ai link) from the app home page (Landing screen) footer, leaving the remaining footer content (e.g., Privacy Policy link and copyright) intact and visually well-spaced.

quotes: Remove created by caffeine line from app home page

acceptanceCriteria: On the home/landing screen, the footer no longer shows any "Built with" / "created by" / "caffeine.ai" attribution text or link.
The Privacy Policy link remains present and functional.
Footer layout still looks consistent (no excessive empty gap where the removed line was).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Removing attribution text from non-home screens.
Changing app branding, logo assets, or any other footer links besides the Caffeine attribution line.
